snippet.title: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2023 Trailer
snippet.description:
Wolverine Studios is back with the ultimate in basketball manager games. If you love franchise mode and want the closest experience to the real thing possible then you want Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2023!

The all new on court action brings the game to a whole new level and new in game features like press conferences increase the realism to your life as a general manager. New ratings, a new leveling up model for your character and even a brand new in-game daily fantasy game makes this the biggest and best version of our franchise hoops game ever.

Check out a free demo and pick up your copy starting 11/23/22 at https://www.wolverinestudios.com
